control_attributes.Control: CM-2 (2) AUTOMATION SUPPORT FOR ACCURACY / CURRENCY
control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to maintain an up-to-date, complete, accurate, and readily available baseline configuration of the information system.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization reviews information system changes [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] and [Assignment: organization-defined circumstances] to determine whether unauthorized changes have occurred.

Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to maintain an up-to-date, complete, accurate, and readily available baseline configuration of the information system.
Control Name: CM-2 (2) AUTOMATION SUPPORT FOR ACCURACY / CURRENCY
